description: This trap is sent when the EQM connection fails.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoEqmConnection CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdIndex i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdDacId i 9999 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdEqmIpAddress s EXAM ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdEqmTcpPort i 9999 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeEqmStatus i 1

description: This is the trap sequence number that increments each
time a trap is sent. It is persistent across resets.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter

description: Severity level of a Cadant trap.
variables.name: CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity

description: The security-domain instance number uniquely identifies
the VPME instance for the E6000.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdIndex

description: DACID uniquely identifies the VPME instance for this SCS.
The default value is 0.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdDacId

description: IP address of the host of the EQM.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdEqmIpAddress

description: TCP port of the EQM.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdEqmTcpPort

description: EQM connection status of E6000.
variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeEqmStatus

description: This trap is sent when a protocol error on the EQM interface
is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeEqmProtocol CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdIndex i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdDacId i 9999 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeErrorStr s EXAMPLE

blocked because of a ECM provivioning failure.

variables.name: ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeProgDacId

description: This trap is sent when a VPME instance is partially configured.
The trap is cleared when the VPME instance is correctly configured
(and set administratively UP) or when the configuration is deleted.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmePartialConfig CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapCounter c 9999 CADANT-CMTS-EQUIPMENT-MIB::trapSeverity i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdIndex i 1 ARRIS-CER-VIDEO-VPME-MIB::cerVideoVpmeSdDacId i 9999
